text: Denis Villeneuve (; born October 3, 1967) is a Canadian movie director, writer, and producer. He is best known for his movies Prisoners (2013) and Sicario (2015), as well as the science fiction movies Arrival (2016) and Blade Runner 2049 (2017). ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:French movie directors Category:French movie producers Category:French screenwriters Category:Canadian movie directors Category:Canadian movie producers Category:Canadian screenwriters Category:Writers from Quebec
title: Denis Villeneuve
